title: The Ledger Unsealed
outcome: Oksana Lintz discovers and leaks a hidden digital ledger tied to Halden, containing evidence of early BCI abuses and disappearances. The city erupts in a desperate search for accountability, forcing the Council into chaos as citizens reclaim power.

events.description: Oksana Lintz uncovers a hidden ledger in Halden’s old data partition detailing secret disappearances from the earliest days of BCI.
The ledger is leaked to citizen channels. Names of the missing from years before the official BCI rollout begin circulating widely.
Citywide vigils and sit-ins erupt near government buildings, demanding answers for all lost to BCI purges since 2022.
Council sessions dissolve into chaos as resignations spread and remaining members blame each other for early abuses and the current crisis.
A citizen assembly forms and announces independent truth commissions, sidelining what remains of the Council. Retired officials are called to testify.
